description: This file defines API routes for managing user notifications in a FastAPI application. It includes endpoints to list notifications, mark a notification as read, and mark all notifications as read, interacting with a database via SQLAlchemy ORM models.

methods.name: list[NotificationResponse] list_notifications( db: Session = Depends(get_db), current: User = Depends(get_current_user), limit: int = 50, )
methods.description: Endpoint to retrieve notifications for the current user, with optional limit.

methods.name: None mark_read(notification_id, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current: User = Depends(get_current_user))
methods.description: Endpoint to mark a specific notification as read.

methods.name: None mark_all_read(db: Session = Depends(get_db), current: User = Depends(get_current_user))
methods.description: Endpoint to mark all notifications as read for the current user.

ctags.name: list_notifications
ctags.signature: ( db: Session = Depends(get_db), current: User = Depends(get_current_user), limit: int = 50, )

ctags.name: mark_all_read
ctags.pattern: /^def mark_all_read(db: Session = Depends(get_db), current: User = Depends(get_current_user)) -> N/

ctags.name: mark_read
ctags.pattern: /^def mark_read(notification_id, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current: User = Depends(get_curren/
ctags.signature: (notification_id, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current: User = Depends(get_current_user))
